articles.title: Gravitas: Solar Flare causes Radio Blackout in Asia & Australia - WION
articles.description: The Sun is erupting and emitting solar flares. On Sunday, one such solar flare caused a radio blackout in Asia and Australia. What is a solar flare? How is it caused? Is it dangerous for human beings? Molly Gambhir brings you a report.
